name: Dino! Catch it (Mobile)
description: Dino! Catch it is an exciting arcade-style game where you play as a cute dinosaur who loves to catch things! In this game, you must help Dino catch as many coins as possible as they fall from the sky. The gameplay is simple and addictive, with easy-to-learn controls that make it suitable for players of all ages. As you progress through the game, the coins will fall faster and in greater numbers, making it more challenging to catch them all. Please note that this game was made in just one hour, as part of a challenge from a friend. If you think the game is not up to your standards, we hope you'll appreciate the effort put into creating it under such a tight deadline. Dino! Catch it features colorful graphics and upbeat music, creating a fun and immersive atmosphere. The game is perfect for quick gameplay sessions and can be enjoyed on-the-go. So, join Dino on his coin-catching adventure and see how many coins you can catch in just one hour!
